titles.title: Families Saving for Education Act of 2012
To make permanent the EGTRRA improvements to Coverdell education savings accounts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/18/2012--Introduced. Families Saving for Education Act of 2012 - Makes permanent provisions of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 relating to Coverdell education savings accounts.
